name: Imagin-a-ship!
description:
------Game Description------

An attempt to create a boat game for the Jammy Jam.

Theme: Embiggen.

Limitation: Make it Blocky.

Didn't quite have enough time to finish it, so it's not quite enjoyable yet. but it's been a great learning experience.

------Controls------

W & S - Increase speed & slowdown

A & D - Rotate ship

Q & E - Fire Canons

------Credits------

Team Leader: Rinycia

Art: Rinycia

Coding: Markus

Sound Markus
